title: Errors with symlinks and Google Drive
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Rclone is showing errors with symlinks. I've tried three times and I still get the same errors. Every single symlink shows that error (yes, the path has 634 symbolic links). If it matters the path points to a mounted veracrypt container formated as NTFS.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

1.53.0

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Windows 10 x64

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Google Drive

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone copy Y:\ Crypt:Boo --verbose --no-update-modtime --transfers 14 --checkers 16 --contimeout 60s --timeout 300s --retries 3 --low-level-retries 10 --exclude /$RECYCLE.BIN/** --exclude /System Volume Information/** --create-empty-src-dirs --backup-dir Crypt:Rem --links --bwlimit Mon-08:00,7M 23:59,off Tue-08:00,7M 23:59,off --max-size 30M --stats 1s --stats-file-name-length 0 --fast-list`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

I see a lot of lines like this and also this is a piece of the end of the log:

```
2020/09/10 01:59:31 ERROR : redacted.mkv.rclonelink: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 0 vs 106
2020/09/10 01:59:31 INFO  : redacted.rclonelink: Removing failed copy
2020/09/10 01:59:31 ERROR : redacted2.mp4.rclonelink: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 0 vs 37
2020/09/10 01:59:31 INFO  : redacted2.mp4.rclonelink: Removing failed copy
2020/09/10 01:59:31 ERROR : redacted3.mkv.rclonelink: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 0 vs 87
2020/09/10 01:59:31 INFO  : redacted3.mkv.rclonelink: Removing failed copy
2020/09/10 01:59:31 INFO  :
Transferred:   	  218.229k / 217.749 kBytes, 100%, 357 Bytes/s, ETA -
Errors:               634 (retrying may help)
Checks:             68649 / 68649, 100%
Transferred:            0 / 4, 0%
Elapsed time:     20m25.7s
Transferring:
* redacted4.rclonelink:  0% /0, 19/s, -
* redacted3.mp4.rclonelink:  0% /0, 16/s, -
* redacted2.mkv.rclonelink:  0% /0, 26/s, -
* redacted.mkv.rclonelink:  0% /0, 30/s, -

2020/09/10 01:59:32 INFO  : There was nothing to transfer
2020/09/10 01:59:32 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 634 errors and: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 0 vs 87
2020/09/10 01:59:32 INFO  :
Transferred:   	  218.229k / 218.229 kBytes, 100%, 356 Bytes/s, ETA 0s
Errors:               634 (retrying may help)
Checks:             68649 / 68649, 100%
Elapsed time:     20m26.7s

2020/09/10 01:59:32 Failed to copy with 634 errors: last error was: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ 0 vs 87
```
